item.title: By: Matthew Kortt
item.dc:creator: Matthew Kortt
item.description: I'm trying your pizza base & sauce recipe tonight! Gonna give the bacon, potato, onion and the chorizo, spinach ones a go on my pizza stones. Gonna squeeze lime on my chorizo too - a little tip someone gave me recently. Will keep you posted as to how it goes. Getting hungry just thinking about it!!! :)
item.content:encoded: I’m trying your pizza base & sauce recipe tonight! Gonna give the bacon, potato, onion and the chorizo, spinach ones a go on my pizza stones. Gonna squeeze lime on my chorizo too – a little tip someone gave me recently. Will keep you posted as to how it goes. Getting hungry just thinking about it!!! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description: Thanks everyone for your great suggestions for toppings and pizza bases... I think it's about time I have pizzas again :P
item.content:encoded: Thanks everyone for your great suggestions for toppings and pizza bases… I think it’s about time I have pizzas again ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Love the sounds of these combinations! I think my number one favourite would have to be plain pepperoni and cheese though but on a really thin base! :)
item.content:encoded: Love the sounds of these combinations! I think my number one favourite would have to be plain pepperoni and cheese though but on a really thin base! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jeena
item.dc:creator: Jeena
item.description: Pizzas look amazing they look like restaurant style pizza.
item.content:encoded: Pizzas look amazing they look like restaurant style pizza.

item.title: By: Forager
item.dc:creator: Forager
item.description: Yum - these look pretty tasty! My favourite flavour would have to be a Puttanesca style pizza with mozzarella, olives, capers and of course anchovies. Yum! Although a Margarita done well is hard to beat!
item.content:encoded: Yum – these look pretty tasty! My favourite flavour would have to be a Puttanesca style pizza with mozzarella, olives, capers and of course anchovies. Yum! Although a Margarita done well is hard to beat!

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: My favourites are supreme with everything (anchovies and olives and pineapple too), and also a good marinara with extra garlic. I like to use lebanese bread as a base, but you shouldn't overload it because it can get too soggy to support the topping.
item.content:encoded: My favourites are supreme with everything (anchovies and olives and pineapple too), and also a good marinara with extra garlic. I like to use lebanese bread as a base, but you shouldn’t overload it because it can get too soggy to support the topping.

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description:
Ooh home made pizza! I am loving on the bacon/potatoes/onions and the pumpkin/feta/onions.. so a combination of those would b perfect hee hee ;)
I have a post but the pizzas are ugly and nowhere as good looking as yours haha
item.content:encoded:
Ooh home made pizza! I am loving on the bacon/potatoes/onions and the pumpkin/feta/onions.. so a combination of those would b perfect hee hee ðŸ˜‰

I have a post but the pizzas are ugly and nowhere as good looking as yours haha

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Pumpkin and fetta is a favourite of mine, and I like your idea of adding caramalised onion. My sister likes to use satay sauce instead of tomato on her bases, but I'm more of a traditionalist and I like tomato best. Did you really count to 300 while you made the dough?
item.content:encoded: Pumpkin and fetta is a favourite of mine, and I like your idea of adding caramalised onion. My sister likes to use satay sauce instead of tomato on her bases, but I’m more of a traditionalist and I like tomato best. Did you really count to 300 while you made the dough?

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: I love vegetarian pizzas...olives, mushrooms, peppers...on a pesto base...yum!
item.content:encoded: I love vegetarian pizzas…olives, mushrooms, peppers…on a pesto base…yum!
